articles.author: Omkar Khandekar
articles.title: Greetings from New Delhi, India, where performing monkeys spark delight -- and ambivalence - NPR
articles.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.
articles.content:
Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.
